backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented feature IDs and titles to their associated frontend files, components, and test IDs for the premium airline visual design and UI polish features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose and key design/functionality details for the Premium Lounge AI app.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH design tokens for light and dark themes including background, foreground, card, border, and chart colors, plus sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app titled 'Premium Lounge AI â€“ Face Recognition Entry System' that mounts the app into a root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing page state ('home', 'members', 'logs', 'status') and rendering the Navbar, Footer, and the appropriate page or home section components based on navigation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Dark navy footer with a gold accent top line, Premium Lounge AI branding, navigation links, system status indicators, copyright, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Fixed premium airline-style navbar with logo branding, four uppercase spaced navigation links with a gold underline active indicator, a system online status badge, and a responsive mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/AccessA: Renders the 'Access Authorization' section (Stage 04) displaying a confirmation checkmark, gate/lounge info cards, passenger summary, and an immutable access log entry with scroll-triggered animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/AIProce: Renders the 'AI Processing' pipeline section (Stage 02) with three animated cards showing image capture, facial feature extraction, and database matching steps, each with progress bars and status indicators.
frontend/src/components/sections/FaceDet: Renders the 'Face Detection' section (Stage 01) with a feature list on the left and an animated camera viewfinder UI on the right, using scroll-triggered fade-in animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/Introdu: Renders the hero/introduction section with a full-screen background image, headline, tagline, feature pills, and a scroll-to-next CTA button that fades in on mount.
frontend/src/components/sections/Verific: Renders the 'Verification Result' section (Stage 03) showing a passenger profile card with confidence score, membership tier, and a toggleable access granted/denied status indicator.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, returning either an authenticated or anonymous actor based on the current Internet Identity, and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions and status flags. Includes an `InternetIdentityProvider` component that persists identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module with no implementation, indicating no backend queries are needed since the application uses only mock/static data.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: Exports two hooks: `useScrollAnimation` for staggered fade-in animations on child elements when a section enters the viewport, and `useActiveSection` for dispatching a custom event when a section becomes visible.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, configures Tailwind CSS, and defines CSS custom properties for a light/dark design system including navy, gold accent, and semantic color tokens, plus reusable component utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider` wrappers around the root `App` component.
frontend/src/pages/EntryLogs.tsx: Displays a filterable audit log table of lounge access events using mock data, with summary stat cards showing total events, granted/denied counts, and average confidence score.
frontend/src/pages/MemberManagement.tsx: Renders a searchable table of mock premium lounge members with tier badges and status indicators, plus a dialog for adding new members with name, tier, and status fields.
Shows a real-time-style security dashboard with system component health cards, key metric stats, and a Recharts bar chart of hourly entry counts using static mock data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts, colors (oklch/hsl design tokens), border radii, shadows, spacing, and keyframe animations for the premium lounge UI.
project_state.json: Project state document describing the premium airport lounge face recognition system's architecture, design requirements, existing features, and known issues at schema version 1.0.0.
